src:
Bivši trener Crvene zvezde na klupi omladinaca Srbije
05 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Nemanja
Fudbalski savez Srbije (FSS) imenovao je Milana Lešnjaka za novog selektora Omladinske reprezentacije Srbije.
Bivši fudbaler i trener omladinskog pogona Crvene zvezde će posle radu u Ljutice Bogdana i Čukaričkom preuzeti selekciju Srbije do 19 godina, odluka je Izvršnog odbora FSS-a.
Lešnjak je na klupi selekcije Srbije nasledio Milana Jevtića koji je smenjen nakon poraza od Španije.
On se tako vraća u reprezentativni fudbal, s obzirom na to da je 2012. godine predvodio selekciju kadeta, u kojoj su se tada nalazili Nemanja Radonjić, Marko Grujić, Andrija Živković…
text:
Former Red Star coach on the Serbian youth bench
05 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Nemanja
The Serbian Football Federation (FSS) has appointed Milan Lesnjak as the new coach of the Serbian National Youth Team.
The former football player and coach of the Red Star youth facility will take over Serbia's selection until the age of 19 after working at Ljutice Bogdan and Cukaricki, a decision by the FSS Executive Board.
Hazelnut succeeded Milan Jevtic on the bench of the Serbian selection, who was dismissed after his defeat to Spain.
He thus returns to national football, considering that in 2012 he led the selection of cadets, which included Nemanja Radonjic, Marko Grujic, Andrija Zivkovic…
